column4: ok i need to completely un-install ubuntu and install 95 or 98 it doesnt matter
well lets put it like this....i have booted from this cd before when i re-installed xp
but i need windows cause wine and crossover is crap for the progs i have to use
- no disk, or no floppy drive?
- ever hear of PXE net boot?
- that will let you boot floppy image files from a server
- do you have a 2nd PC (even an old P1-75)
- is one of them a DHCP server?
- so yes?  cuz Mr admin (im gussing dad) might be up for some mods that will help you out
- so you aren't interested in any more help?
- would booting a knoppix cd on the "server" be considered messing with the server?
- what about turning off the server?
